thread.title: Former BBY boss Glenn Rosewall sells Sydney penthouse for $2.175 million
thread.title_full: Former BBY boss Glenn Rosewall sells Sydney penthouse for $2.175 million | afr.com

author: Share via Email
title: Former BBY boss Glenn Rosewall sells Sydney penthouse for $2.175 million
text:
Glenn Rosewall was relieved of his duties at BBY after the stock broking business was placed into administration in May. Rod Clement Share on twitter Share on Google Plus by Will Glasgow After a profitable weekend, Glenn Rosewall is flushed with cash.
The former BBY executive chairman's Bellevue Hill penthouse and its expansive Sydney Harbour views sold for $2.175 million on Saturday to a local buyer.
The sale of the three-bedroom pad comes less than three months after Rosewall was relieved of his duties at BBY after the stock broking business was placed into administration .
BBY was majority owned by Glenn and his father, tennis great Ken Rosewall .
The price didn't quite reach the $2.3 million that had been floated â€“ but it was still up on the $1.7 million Rosewall paid for the place back in 2010.
If only BBY's many unhappy creditors were as lucky.
